methods.name: EnableFeature
methods.documentation: EnableFeature allows you to enable cluster features that are disabled by default.

params.name: feature
params.documentation: Valid values:vvols: Enable the Virtual Volumes (VVOLs) cluster feature.

methods.name: GetFeatureStatus
methods.documentation: GetFeatureStatus allows you to retrieve the status of a cluster feature.

params.name: feature
params.documentation: Valid values:vvols: Enable the Virtual Volumes (VVOLs) cluster feature.

members.documentation: An array of feature objects indicating the feature name and its status.
members.name: features
